item.title: Scaling the experience with the multi-brand Catalyst and Sitecore XM
item.description: [en] Sitecore's XM Cloud speeds up brand site deployment. The Valtech Catalyst automates this process, reducing time and cost. It enhances consistency and quality for multi-brand organizations. The Catalyst integrates design systems efficiently, offering a centralized content structure. Utilizing Sitecore XM Cloud, it streamlines brand site rollouts by up to 40%. This innovative tool combines technology, content, and design elements to scale ambitions effectively. The Valtech Catalyst ensures consistent world-class experiences through automated brand styling and quality control. It optimizes the deployment process, reducing time to market and enhancing operational efficiency.
